title: Facebook Twitter Google LinkedIn
extract: LinkedIn is a social networking site designed specifically for the business community. ... Network members are called “connections.” Unlike other free social networking sites like Facebook or Twitter, LinkedIn requires connections to have a pre-existing relationship.
extract_html: LinkedIn is a social networking site designed specifically for the business community. ... Network members are called “connections.” Unlike other free social networking sites like Facebook or Twitter, LinkedIn requires connections to have a pre-existing relationship.
